unnormalised: OMG, planning my cousin's wedding is turning into a full-time job! The baaraat is supposed to arrive at 7:30 PM sharp on 12/12/2024, but knowing Indian Standard Time, I'm adding a "flexible" 2-hour buffer. The Panditji wants the pheras done before 4:00 AM the next day, so everyone better stock up on chai and Red Bull! And don't even get me started on the "sangeet prep starting 3 weeks before" – I'm going to need a vacation after this wedding is over!
normalised: Oh my G-D, planning my cousin's wedding is turning into a full-time job! The baaraat is supposed to arrive at seven thirty P-M sharp on twelfth december two thousand and twenty four, but knowing Indian Standard Time, I'm adding a "flexible" two hour buffer. The Panditji wants the pheras done before four A-M the next day, so everyone better stock up on chai and Red Bull! And don't even get me started on the "sangeet prep starting three weeks before" – I'm going to need a vacation after this wedding is over!
